metadata.title: CVE-2022-1620 on Ubuntu 21.10 (impish) - medium.
metadata.description: NULL Pointer Dereference in function vim_regexec_string at regexp.c:2729 in GitHub repository vim/vim prior to 8.2.4901. NULL Pointer Dereference in function vim_regexec_string at regexp.c:2729 allows attackers to cause a denial of service (application crash) via a crafted input.

criterions.comment: vim package in impish is affected and needs fixing.
